title: Track fault causing delays on NSL

updates.text: [NSL] Update: Rail replacement will be done tonight after operating hours, and normal train service will resume tomorrow morning.
[NSL] Update: NB train services have resumed. Travelling times are back to normal.
Rail crack fault temporarily rectified. Full replacement after train operating hours. Train safe.
NB svc btn MarinaBay & Braddell delayed due to rail crack. Engineers deployed to secure rail joint. Trains travelling slower for safety.
Due to a rail crack near Braddell, trains are safe for travel and additional travel time of 30min from Marina Bay towards Bishan.
[NSL] UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travel time from #DhobyGhaut towards #Bishan due to track fault.
[NSL]: Estimated 10 mins additional travelling time from #DhobyGhaut to #Bishan towards JurongEast due to track fault.
